articles.description: Former Pakistan skipper Wasim Akram continued to make more revelations as he criticised former teammate Ramiz Raja for his poor fielding in the slip cordon and said he fielded at that position because his father was a commissioner.
articles.content: Saleem Malik responds to Wasim Akram's 'treated me like servant' allegations, says former pacer wants 'publicity'

articles.author: Samuel Meade
articles.title: Kevin De Bruyne and Jan Vertonghen in three-man dressing room bust-up after Belgium loss - The Mirror
articles.description: Belgium were surprisingly beaten by Morocco on Sunday with several members of the team clashing after the loss as Kevin De Bruyne had to be pulled apart from his team-mate
articles.content:
Romelu Lukaku had to pull apart Kevin De Bruyne and Jan Vertonghen as the Belgium pair came to blows after their World Cup defeat, as per reports.

articles.title: 'Felt Humiliated': Indian chess Grand Master SL Narayanan after being made to stand barefeet for metal detector check in middle of playing hall - The Indian Express
